item.title: Kenja no Mago
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the “Magi.” Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the “Magi.”
Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life, he absorbed the Magi’s craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic
Then, the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.
“Ah, I forgot to teach him common sense.”
The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people, lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize, he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.

item.title: Bouken-ka ni Narou! ~Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku~
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to “stand out.” One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a “Skill Board” with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to “stand out.” One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a “Skill Board” with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?

item.title: Live Dungeon!
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated, Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then, Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated, Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then, Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any thought of strategy. The misfortune of getting the healer position. Tsutomu reinstated the White Mage that had always been his favorite in games and aimed to conquer the dungeon to find the key to his escape from the different world.

item.title: I Was Trash
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
He was looked down on, forced to break off his engagement, he was murdered, maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me, the strongest cultivator, Cang Kun Zi, as I reborned. Now that I’m here, I’ll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: He was looked down on, forced to break off his engagement, he was murdered, maybe this is the life that trash should have… But he was taken over by me, the strongest cultivator, Cang Kun Zi, as I reborned. Now that I’m here, I’ll make the best of it! Watch as I use this trash body of mine to trample upon you mere ants!

item.title: Meng Shi Zai Shang
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
She transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when the male lead was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak male lead, she was troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2....
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded:
She transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when the male lead was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak male lead, she was troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from the male lead, she chose the second option. Things don’t always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.

Master? Want treasure? Let’s cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

item.title: Yong Heng Zhi Zun
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
It has been a year since Li Fu Chen lost his “Talent”. Now he lives the life of a trash, being bullied and beaten by those who once were inferior to him. However, he still has yet to lose everything as he’s still engaged to a strong and pretty lady of a powerful family but...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded:
It has been a year since Li Fu Chen lost his “Talent”. Now he lives the life of a trash, being bullied and beaten by those who once were inferior to him. However, he still has yet to lose everything as he’s still engaged to a strong and pretty lady of a powerful family but that came to an end when the engagement was abruptly cancelled.

With shame brought to the family and his life engulfed by darkness, a ray of hope pierced the the sky.

item.title: Stellar Transformations
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description:
A child was naturally born unable to practice asceticism/ inner strength. To get his fathers attention, he chose to practice outer strength the painful way. Spring passed Autumn came, time flew, this child grew as the year passed… He became a teenager, the thing that changed his fate is a spear that’s is made from...
Continue Reading →
item.content:encoded: A child was naturally born unable to practice asceticism/ inner strength. To get his fathers attention, he chose to practice outer strength the painful way. Spring passed Autumn came, time flew, this child grew as the year passed… He became a teenager, the thing that changed his fate is a spear that’s is made from a shooting star/ shooting star that became a spear…

item.title: Miracle App Store
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: We’re stuck in our mundane lives. Dreaming of the lives we wish we had. But what if all your dreams could be solved with a few clicks. Would you take it?
item.content:encoded: We’re stuck in our mundane lives. Dreaming of the lives we wish we had. But what if all your dreams could be solved with a few clicks. Would you take it?

item.title: Martial God’s Space
item.dc:creator: Ghajik
item.description: He’s been transported to another world. And the adopted son of a powerful family. But the heavens are unjust he has bad cultivation. But heaven pitying him has given a magical space. Follow his journey in this new world…
item.content:encoded: He’s been transported to another world. And the adopted son of a powerful family. But the heavens are unjust he has bad cultivation. But heaven pitying him has given a magical space. Follow his journey in this new world…
